name: SZEasyTipView
summary:
Elegant tooltip view written in Objective-C, copy from
  EasyTipView(https://github.com/teodorpatras/EasyTipView)
description:
EasyTipView is a fully customisable tooltip view written in
  Objective-C that can be used as a call to action or informative tip. It can be shown above of below any UIBarItem or UIView subclass.
